articles.title: Orlando Magic shut Paolo Banchero down for remainder of 2022 NBA summer league
articles.description: After a sterling first couple of games, the Magic decided to shut down No. 1 pick Paolo Banchero for the remainder of summer league.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS -- Paolo Banchero showed the Orlando Magic plenty in his two Summer League contests. And the Magic decided that was enough.

articles.title: Ex-Michigan Wolverines, Detroit Lions coach Gary Moeller dies at 81
articles.description: Gary Moeller, who succeeded Bo Schembechler as Michigan's coach and later led the Detroit Lions as interim coach, died Monday. He was 81.
